skillTree.localised_description: Initially desiring simply to join his brothers in death, Helman Ghorst now travels atop a Corpse Cart driven by his Undead kin.

effects.description: Mount: The Brothers Ghorst Corpse Cart

skillTree.localised_description: Helman Ghorst knows what he should not, but knowing is not enough – he must utilise this denied knowledge.

effects.description:
Research rate: +10%
	(factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: What Helman Ghorst has lost, he will reclaim – no power of this world or beyond will stop him.

effects.description: Raise dead cost: -15%
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Awaken from the Grave"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Awaken from the Grave Upgraded"
Passive ability: "Master of the Dead"
Spell number of uses: +1 for "Awaken from the Grave"

ui_effects.localised_text: ➕ Summons a unit of Grave Guards

skillTree.localised_description: The experienced battlefield Necromancer bolsters the defensive capabilities of Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine crews by their presence alone.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +12 for Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
	(Lord's army)
Recruit rank: +3 for Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 (when attacking)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Ghorst traverses the forsaken realm as he did the roads of the Empire, as a groom, before the study of necromancy consumed his every waking moment.

effects.description: Speed: +10%
Campaign movement range: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Mastery of the dark arts has imbued Ghorst with preternatural strength, enabling him to easily hold his own in combat.

effects.description: Melee attack: +15
Melee defence: +15

skillTree.localised_description: Over time, Ghorst's skin has toughened like that of a corpse, causing arrows and sword-blows that would normally kill a man to merely glance off.

effects.description: Armour: +25
Missile resistance: 20%

skillTree.localised_description: Having survived the deadly Plague of Blue Roses, even after deliberately infecting himself, Ghorst can easily recover from lesser wounds and sicknesses.

effects.description: Hit points: +25%
Physical resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: By which those caught in Ghorst's Danse Macabre are hurled forward into the fray, becoming far more lethal whilst the spell lasts.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.localised_description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +15
Ability: "Arcane Conduit"

skillTree.localised_description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.localised_description: "Arise my host, my Unliving minions - bring me victory!"

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units

Melee defence: +8 for Zombies, Skeletons, Crypt Ghouls and Grave Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Can you hear it… the call of the night? Time for its children to arise and swarm."

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Such evil spirits are desperate to spill mortal blood, and will speed along until they find some flesh to carve.

skillTree.localised_description: The Lord howls out into the night, and is answered by the baying of dark creatures.

skillTree.localised_description: Vampires summon forth the gruesome remains of the ancient dead to bolster the masses of lesser minions under their control.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Black Knights and Blood Knights units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: By their very nature, most Vampires try to avoid discomfort and travel in style.

Melee defence: +4 for Black Coach, Corpse Cart and Mortis Engine units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "…and the legions of the dead envoked all hell upon the world."

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Undead Lord has followed the warrior's path to its ultimate conclusion, in a dark mockery of a Knight's vow.

skillTree.localised_description: The power of death cannot be denied.

skillTree.localised_description: The Dark Magic-user can take to the skies, defying gravity by metamorphosing into a bat.

skillTree.localised_description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +3%
	(Lord's army)

Casualty replenishment rate: +8%
	(Lord's army)

Casualty replenishment rate: +15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A powerful, vigorous Lord of Darkness will see the Children of the Night gather unto them.

skillTree.localised_description: The sun is no ally of the dead - a sky scorched black, or darkest night, will invigorate the Unliving.
